short: Mask prediction is a text processing task in which one or more words are masked or hidden, and the model attempts to predict what word(s) should fill the missing gap. The input for this model requires a string with ‘MASK’ somewhere in it. It will output the predicted word to fill in the gap. Try a special masked version of the AFI movie quotes dataset. See the Learn More link above for a description of projects using this for research.
long:
Mask prediction is a text processing task in which one or more words are masked or hidden, and the model attempts to predict what word(s) should fill the missing gap. The input for this model requires a string with ‘MASK’ somewhere in it. It will output the predicted word to fill in the gap. Try a special masked version of the AFI movie quotes dataset. See the Learn More link above for a description of projects using this for research.
